markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Friendly Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=1615) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are adjacent to an ally and have one or more hands free.

</column>

---

You toss your friends around the battlefield. Pick up an adjacent ally of your size or smaller and throw them to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet. Their movement doesn't trigger reactions. Your ally ends this movement on their feet and doesn't take damage from the fall. If your ally ends this movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against an enemy within their reach as a reaction.
name: Friendly Toss
requirement: You are adjacent to an ally and have one or more hands free.
requirement_markdown: You are adjacent to an ally and have one or more hands free.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Friendly Toss Two Actions Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 110 2.0 Requirements You are adjacent to an ally and have one or more hands free. --- You toss your friends around the battlefield. Pick up an adjacent ally of your size or smaller and throw them to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet. Their movement doesn't trigger reactions. Your ally ends this movement on their feet and doesn't take damage from the fall. If your ally ends this movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against an enemy within their reach as a reaction.
